title: Gulliver's Cream Corn
directions: Place corn kernels, whipping cream, milk, salt, flavor enhancer, sugar, and white or cayenne pepper in a large stockpot. Bring to a slow, low boil beginning on medium heat, stirring frequently. Simmer for 5 minutes on low heat.
Melt butter in the microwave, or in a small saucepan on low heat. Whisk in flour until smooth. Stir into the corn until well blended. Enjoy!
ingredients: 2 (20 ounce) packages frozen corn kernels, thawed
Â¼ teaspoon monosodium glutamate (MSG, or Accent flavor enhancer)
